statements: DELETE FROM BillingAndPayments WHERE customer_id = 456 AND amount > 100.00;
DELETE FROM BillingAndPayments WHERE billing_id = 100 AND customer_id = 500
DELETE FROM payment_transactions WHERE customer_id = 202 AND amount < 100.0;
DELETE FROM billing_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 100 AND amount > 50.00
DELETE FROM payment_transactions WHERE customer_id = 200 AND payment_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM payment WHERE amount > 100 AND date <= '2022-05-01';
DELETE FROM billing WHERE customer_id = 100 AND amount > 5000;
DELETE FROM payment WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card' AND amount < 1000;
DELETE FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 AND payment_status = 'Pending';
